subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Publicly and privately, the Yankees acknowledge there is no better man for the job of No. 2 hitter than Damon. But as long as Nick Johnson passes his physical, there is no going back.
snippet: Publicly and privately, the Yankees acknowledge there is no better man for the job of No. 2 hitter than Damon. But as long as Nick Johnson passes his physical, there is no going back.
